tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE bill_payments (
    payment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    bill_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    amount NUMERIC NOT NULL,
    due_date DATE NOT NULL,
    payer_id INT NOT NULL,
    reminder_enabled BOOL DEFAULT FALSE,
    reminder_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE scheduled_queries (
    query_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    query_description TEXT,
    query_text TEXT,
    frequency INTERVAL,
    last_executed TIMESTAMP
);
CREATE TABLE bill_payments (id INT PRIMARY KEY, bill_name VARCHAR(255), amount DECIMAL, due_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE reminders (reminder_id INT PRIMARY KEY, bill_id INT, reminder_date DATE, status VARCHAR(50));
CREATE TABLE scheduled_queries (query_id INT PRIMARY KEY, query_text TEXT, frequency VARCHAR(50), last_run TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE PaymentReminders (
    reminder_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    bill_name VARCHAR,
    bill_amount DECIMAL,
    due_date DATE
);
